name: Max Verstappen
description: Dutch driver, multiple-time F1 World Champion, dominant with Red Bull Racing.

name: Charles Leclerc
description: Monegasque driver for Scuderia Ferrari, famous for his pole positions and aggressive racing style.

name: Carlos Sainz
description: Spanish driver, reliable and quick, delivering consistent results with Ferrari.

name: Lando Norris
description: British driver, renowned for his impressive overtakes and racecraft with McLaren.

name: Oscar Piastri
description: Australian driver, rookie talent, showing potential and speed in his debut seasons with McLaren.

name: Lewis Hamilton
description: British seven-time F1 World Champion, known for his unmatched consistency and race wins with Mercedes.

name: George Russell
description: British driver with Mercedes, famous for his pace, technical feedback, and rising talent.

name: Fernando Alonso
description: Spanish two-time F1 World Champion, racing for Aston Martin and bringing decades of experience to the team.

name: Lance Stroll
description: Canadian driver, consistent and adaptable, racing for Aston Martin alongside Fernando Alonso.

name: Pierre Gasly
description: French driver, strong on racecraft, and now leading Alpine with his experience and speed.

name: Esteban Ocon
description: French driver, known for his resilience and pace, a strong driver at Alpine alongside Gasly.

name: Zhou Guanyu
description: Chinese driver, first full-time F1 driver from China, showing progress with Alfa Romeo.

name: Valtteri Bottas
description: Finnish driver, former Mercedes star, now bringing his wealth of experience to Alfa Romeo.

name: Nyck de Vries
description: Dutch driver, former Formula E champion, racing for AlphaTauri with a sharp focus on developing the car.

name: Yuki Tsunoda
description: Japanese driver, fast and aggressive on track, working to refine his consistency with AlphaTauri.

name: Alexander Albon
description: Thai-British driver, consistent and improving with Williams, known for his racecraft and sharp overtakes.

name: Logan Sargeant
description: American rookie driver, aiming to make his mark with Williams as a full-time F1 competitor.
